title: Very Obviously A Zombie

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every message you post in any chats must contain zombie noises or mentions of wanting to eat brains. (Example: Ughhhhhh... guuuuggghhhh.... mrghhhhhh... or hey guys do you want to head over to the tavern for some brians i mean fries?)
- If you post a message not following the requirements above (as determined by host) you will be vulnerable for the night.
- You cannot be hanged, because you are not a zombie.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make it to the end of the game without breaking the rules OR be the last one alive. brains.

desc:
Post 5258
*Guys... guuuughhh.... im not a zombie trust me... brainnnnsss...*
